name: BoomThatBoi
description:
Red smily guy is the player and follows your mouse. Buy upgrades with money that you pick up.

I was not able to polish or even complete most of the game because I am travelling. I just decided to submit what I have with bare-bone placeholder art and mechanics. When I get back I will most likely finish just for the sake of finishing it. Sadly this is all I can submit to the game jam :(.
